title: Electronic Benefit Verification (EBV) System
description: Led design and implementation of an EBV platform automating prescription drug coverage checks with optimized PostgreSQL data models supporting 15M+ formulary records.
longDescription: Enterprise-grade Electronic Benefit Verification system that automates prescription drug coverage verification for healthcare providers. The platform processes millions of formulary records with low-latency queries, uses OCR-based ingestion for insurance data extraction, and implements intelligent caching to reduce processing time and API costs.
features: Automated prescription drug coverage verification system
Optimized PostgreSQL data models supporting 15M+ formulary records
Parallel OCR-based ingestion for insurance formulary data extraction
Document deduplication and intelligent caching system
Low-latency queries for real-time coverage checks
Normalized insurance formulary data processing
Reduced OCR API costs through smart caching strategies
Scalable architecture handling high-volume requests
challenges: Managing 15M+ formulary records with low-latency requirements, optimizing OCR processing costs, ensuring data accuracy during parallel ingestion, and normalizing diverse insurance data formats.
solutions: Designed optimized PostgreSQL schemas with proper indexing, implemented intelligent caching and document deduplication, coordinated parallel OCR processing pipelines, and built robust data normalization layers.
results: Successfully deployed EBV platform processing 15M+ formulary records with reduced processing time and OCR costs. System handles real-time coverage verification with high accuracy.
architecture: React ‚Üí FastAPI ‚Üí PostgreSQL ‚Üí Mistral OCR ‚Üí AWS S3 ‚Üí Redis Cache

title: Agentic Bank Statement Analyzer
description: AI-powered system to extract, categorize, and analyze large-scale financial transactions using Hugging Face transformers and RAG-enabled chatbot for context-aware insights.
longDescription: Intelligent financial analysis platform that processes high-volume bank transaction data using advanced AI techniques. Deploys Hugging Face transformers for entity recognition and transaction classification, implements RAG pipelines with ChromaDB for context-aware financial insights, and provides comprehensive analytics dashboards for expense patterns, income distribution, and savings trends.
features: AI-powered extraction and categorization of financial transactions
Hugging Face transformers for entity recognition
Intelligent transaction classification using ML models
RAG-enabled chatbot with ChromaDB for context-aware insights
Analytics dashboards for expense patterns and trends
Income distribution and savings trend analysis
High-volume transaction processing capabilities
Natural language queries for financial data
Automated financial report generation
challenges: Processing large-scale transaction data efficiently, accurate entity recognition in financial context, implementing RAG for contextual insights, and creating intuitive visualizations for complex financial data.
solutions: Deployed Hugging Face transformers for robust entity recognition, implemented RAG pipelines with ChromaDB for semantic search, built scalable FastAPI backend for high-volume processing, and designed interactive dashboards with React.
results: Successfully deployed financial analyzer processing high-volume bank transactions with accurate categorization. RAG-enabled chatbot provides context-aware insights helping users understand spending patterns and savings opportunities.
architecture: React ‚Üí FastAPI ‚Üí MongoDB ‚Üí ChromaDB ‚Üí Hugging Face Transformers

title: ScribeX - AI Medical Transcription & Reporting
description: Automated clinical transcription system converting doctor-patient conversations into structured SOAP reports using LLMs, AWS Bedrock, and Textract with semantic validation.
longDescription: Enterprise AI medical transcription platform that automates real-time transcription of doctor-patient conversations into structured SOAP reports. Integrates AWS Bedrock, Textract, Polly, and Hugging Face models for speech-to-text and clinical summarization. Features error-correction agents with semantic search and reasoning for clinical data accuracy, ensuring HIPAA-compliant encrypted storage.
features: Real-time transcription of doctor-patient conversations
Automated generation of structured SOAP reports
AWS Bedrock integration for advanced LLM processing
AWS Textract for document processing and extraction
Semantic validation for transcription accuracy
Error-correction agents with semantic search and reasoning
HIPAA-compliant encrypted storage and retrieval
Semantic querying of patient records
Multi-model integration (AWS + Hugging Face + OpenAI)
challenges: Ensuring clinical accuracy in transcriptions, handling medical terminology correctly, maintaining HIPAA compliance, implementing real-time processing, and integrating multiple AI services seamlessly.
solutions: Integrated AWS Bedrock and Hugging Face models for robust speech-to-text, designed error-correction agents with semantic validation, implemented HIPAA-compliant encryption, and built semantic search for accurate clinical data retrieval.
results: Successfully deployed medical transcription system with high accuracy in clinical documentation. Automated SOAP report generation saving significant time for healthcare providers while maintaining compliance standards.
architecture: React ‚Üí FastAPI ‚Üí AWS Bedrock ‚Üí AWS Textract ‚Üí Hugging Face ‚Üí Encrypted Storage

title: Resume Automation System (üèÜ 1st Prize Winner)
description: Built an AI-powered system for generating resumes and cover letters from user-selected templates. Won 1st prize in internal hackathon. The system parses user-uploaded resumes, cover letters, and skill matrices to enhance content using LLMs.
longDescription: An intelligent resume generation platform that uses AI to help job seekers create professional, ATS-friendly resumes and cover letters. This hackathon-winning project analyzes existing documents, extracts key information, and generates enhanced content tailored to specific job descriptions. The system achieved 90% user satisfaction and won 1st prize in the internal hackathon at Connected Value Health Solutions.
features: Generates resumes and cover letters using AI-enhanced templates
Parses uploaded resumes, cover letters, and skill matrices intelligently
Integrated Mistral Model API for LLM-based content generation
Secure authentication with login, signup, and password recovery
Multiple professional templates to choose from
ATS optimization for better job application success
Sub-5-second generation time
challenges: Accurately parsing various resume formats, maintaining consistent formatting across templates, and generating contextually relevant content.
solutions: Implemented robust PDF parsing with fallback mechanisms, created a flexible template system, and fine-tuned LLM prompts for professional content generation.
results: üèÜ Won 1st prize in internal hackathon. System successfully generates professional resumes with 90% user satisfaction rate and sub-5-second generation time.
architecture: React frontend ‚Üí FastAPI backend ‚Üí Mistral AI API ‚Üí MongoDB ‚Üí PDF Parser

title: AI-Powered Medical Chatbot
description: Developed an AI-driven chatbot that provides primary medication recommendations based on user input. The system combines Mistral AI with LangChain and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) for accurate, context-aware responses.
longDescription: An intelligent medical chatbot that leverages cutting-edge AI technologies to provide accurate medication recommendations. Built during my internship at Connected Value Health Solutions, this system uses Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to combine the power of large language models with a curated medical knowledge base, ensuring responses are both contextually relevant and medically sound.
features: Provides AI-based medical recommendations through conversational interface
Integrated Mistral AI with LangChain and RAG for context-aware responses
Built secure FastAPI backend with FAISS for fast vector-based search
Implemented Firebase Authentication for secure login and document uploads
Real-time chat interface with message history
Medical document upload and processing
Sub-2-second response times with 94% accuracy
challenges: Ensuring medical accuracy while maintaining conversational fluency, implementing efficient vector search for large medical databases, and handling edge cases in user queries.
solutions: Implemented RAG architecture with FAISS for fast similarity search, fine-tuned prompts for medical context, and added fallback mechanisms for uncertain responses.
results: Successfully deployed chatbot with 94% accuracy in medication recommendations and sub-2-second response times. Currently being used in production environment.
architecture: React frontend ‚Üí FastAPI backend ‚Üí Mistral AI API ‚Üí FAISS Vector DB ‚Üí Firebase Auth

title: Online Job Portal (MERN Stack)
description: Developed a comprehensive job portal web application using the MERN stack, featuring user authentication, role-based access control, job listings, job manipulation, and resume uploading.
longDescription: A full-featured job portal connecting employers with job seekers. The platform includes separate dashboards for recruiters and candidates, advanced job search and filtering, application tracking, and resume management. Built as a freelance project showcasing full-stack development expertise.
features: User authentication with JWT tokens and secure sessions
Role-based access control (Recruiter/Candidate)
Job posting and management for recruiters
Advanced job search with filters (location, salary, experience)
Resume upload and management with file validation
Application tracking system with status updates
Responsive UI with Material-UI and Bootstrap
Email notifications for job applications
challenges: Implementing secure authentication, managing complex state across user roles, and optimizing database queries for large datasets.
solutions: Used JWT for stateless authentication, implemented Redux for state management, and created efficient MongoDB indexes for fast queries.
results: Successfully deployed portal handling 1000+ job listings with seamless user experience and 500+ active users.

title: Contact Management REST API
description: Built a robust backend for a contact management application using Express and Node.js. Implemented RESTful APIs for managing contacts with full CRUD operations, JWT authentication, and MongoDB integration.
longDescription: A scalable contact management system with RESTful API architecture. The backend provides secure endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting contacts, with JWT-based authentication and MongoDB for data persistence. Includes comprehensive API documentation and rate limiting.
features: RESTful API design with full CRUD operations
JWT-based authentication and authorization
MongoDB database with Mongoose ODM
Input validation and error handling
API documentation with Swagger
Rate limiting and security middleware
Password hashing with bcrypt
Comprehensive error responses
challenges: Designing scalable API architecture, implementing secure authentication, and handling concurrent requests efficiently.
solutions: Implemented JWT tokens with refresh mechanism, used MongoDB indexes for fast queries, and added caching layer for frequently accessed data.
results: Deployed API handling 10,000+ requests per day with 99.5% uptime and sub-100ms response times.

title: AI-Powered Portfolio Website
description: Built a modern portfolio website with integrated AI chatbot using RAG architecture, LangChain, and Gemini. Features include dynamic project showcase, career timeline, and intelligent chat assistant.
longDescription: A cutting-edge portfolio website showcasing full-stack and GenAI expertise. The site features an AI-powered chat assistant that uses RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) with Pinecone vector database and Gemini embeddings to answer questions about experience, projects, and skills. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern UI libraries.
features: AI chatbot with RAG architecture for intelligent Q&A
Pinecone vector database for semantic search
Gemini embeddings for query understanding
Dynamic project showcase with filtering
Animated career timeline with alternating cards
Responsive design with Framer Motion animations
GitHub integration for live repository data
Contact form with email integration
challenges: Integrating RAG system with portfolio data, optimizing vector search performance, and creating smooth animations.
solutions: Implemented efficient vector seeding, used LangChain for agent orchestration, and optimized component rendering with React best practices.
results: Live portfolio with AI chat assistant achieving 95% accuracy in answering queries about experience and projects.
architecture: Next.js ‚Üí LangChain Agent ‚Üí Gemini LLM ‚Üí Pinecone Vector DB ‚Üí GitHub API
